It's important today.

  • Joseph Borrel stated that the sanctions against the Russian CPC were ineffective.

  • The candidacy of President Nadjddin will check for foreign funding

  • The head of the Georgian cabinet, Garibashvili, announced the resignation

  • NAP-2024: what changes are expected in the new year

  • Assistant President Ushakov said that negotiations with Kiev were not possible: No one to talk to.

  • Patriarch Kirill found damage in another Western holiday.

  • Schengen Military in Europe wants to be established by July 2024

  • In Germany, the names of new Russian atoms were evaluated.

  • In Hungary, it was stated that the European Union would not be blackmailed.

  • Ukrainian journalist Dmitri Gordon has been re-accused in Russia

  • The Ukrainian deputy noted Kiev ' s willingness to negotiate with Moscow

Media news2

Cases

29.01.2024 14:47

In Cheboxarah, the primary schoolteacher set up a school on the orders of Ukrainian fraudsters.

She's also on a robbery case.

29.01.2024 16:36

In Petersburg hymnazi, a grenade exploded right in the hands of a student.

It's clear that the affected child was sent to the clinic.

29.01.2024 16:29

A resident of Pskov province, who lived with the bodies of three children, extended the arrest

The woman showed how she strangled her children during the investigation.

29.01.2024 16:22

The police are looking for a passenger who helped the conductor remove the Twix cat from the train.

The carrier was suspended during the investigation and the RCD changed the technology and the animal transport system.

29.01.2024 16:17

Eight rockets were fired at the Kalinin district of Donetsk

Eight rockets were fired at the area at 1503.

29.01.2024 16:06

The number of detainees in the attack on the church in Istanbul increased to 51

Two masked men opened fire on parishes during prayer.

29.01.2024 15:51

In Petersburg, blogger and rapper Tarasova were held for the fight.

An 18-year-old guy wrote a statement on him.

29.01.2024 15:43

Dron Kakadze damaged the gas supply line in the village of Tishank Belgorod province

No casualties were reported by the head of the region.

29.01.2024 15:36

In Ekaterinburg, a 2-year-old girl died from a tox in her apartment.

The girl was home with her father, her big brother and sister.

29.01.2024 15:22

In Saransk, a local citizen was arrested and killed two people because of a loud music.

Criminal proceedings have been initiated under article 105, paragraph 2, of the Criminal Code (the murder of two persons).

29.01.2024 15:14

In Chelabinsk, a trial of unemployed workers for arson of relay cabinets began.

According to the investigation, the accused was an opponent of SVR, and on 6 June, a saboteur contacted him in a telegram.

29.01.2024 15:06

In Moscow, a man sprayed a pepper spray in three policemen

Criminal proceedings have been initiated under article 318, paragraph 1, of the Criminal Code (use of violence against a representative of authority).

29.01.2024 14:58

In the Yaroslav region, the NPA fell with a drone

Suppose the drone flew with explosives.

29.01.2024 14:27

The details of the bus accident at Ural were known.

A representative of IAU, " Sports School of the Olympic Reserve " , Novouralski, reported that a bus with a child hockey team in Sverdlov province had travelled to the counterway because of a broken wheel. The driver and passengers of Citroen, who was on the way of the carrier, were killed.

29.01.2024 14:09

The punishment for attempting to remove a large gold shipment from Russia has become known.

Previously, a man was detained at Sheremievo airport, where he found gold clips worth over 111 million roubles.

29.01.2024 13:38

In Tul province, the mother blames the medics for the death of her three-year-old child.

The head of the Russian Investigation Committee, Alexander Bastrekin, has commissioned a criminal investigation into the death of a three-year-old child in the Tul region.

29.01.2024 09:49

The girl whose parents died in the accident in Nadok is in a difficult state in a mountain hospital on IWL.

For the life of an 8-year-old victim, doctors of reanimation are fighting.

29.01.2024 09:21

Ural ' s ex-section was slain by a secret grave scandal and possible retaliation of the leadership.

Former policeman Yuri Zolotko is accused of exceeding his authority.

29.01.2024 07:44

In the Lipec region, a drunk driver hit three people at a public stop, one of the victims died.

OIA reported that the accident occurred in the city of Lebedian.

29.01.2024 07:31

In Sverdlov province, a production building of 800 square metres was burning, firemen managed to locate the flames.

The MSU regionally clarified the details of the incident in the city of Aramila.

29.01.2024 05:18

In Blagoschensk, a case was brought against a teenager who had made a telephone call about " mine " of schools

The Department of Internal Affairs in Amur province reported the detention of a “telephone terrorist”.

29.01.2024 04:59

A high-speed vehicle moved to the army embassy guard post in Seoul, the police are aware of what happened.

A security officer was seriously injured.

29.01.2024 03:12

In Buryat, the taxi driver saved the pensioners' money from the fraudsters and instead of the bank, delivered the victims of the frauds to the police.

The incident occurred in mid-January 2024.

29.01.2024 02:51

The SC re-established a case of beating a girl for a comment on dogs without mosquitoes, which had previously been cancelled by the Public Prosecutor ' s Office.

The investigative committee of Russia informed about the re-establishment of a criminal case concerning the use of violence against a mosquito, which had made a verbal compulsion because of the negligence of dog owners.

29.01.2024 00:48

In Sverdlov province, on 28 January, 12-year-old Sofia Olainikov was missing, and the police were looking for teenagers.

The search and rescue team Prospect provided details of what happened.
